features.name: AD Authentication Settings Configuration
features.description: Configure Active Directory authentication settings including Windows authentication, domain settings, and authentication credentials
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings
test_scenarios: Configure root domain and email domain

features.name: Manual AD Login
features.description: Allows users to manually login using their Active Directory credentials through a login form

features.name: Windows Single Sign-On (SSO)
features.description: Automatic authentication using Windows integrated authentication for domain-joined computers
features.ui_location: Automatic - triggered by accessing the site from domain-joined computer
test_scenarios: Test with Windows authentication enabled in IIS
Verify proper handling of non-authenticated users

features.name: Role Synchronization
features.description: Synchronizes user roles in DNN with Active Directory security groups
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Synchronize Role
test_scenarios: Verify AD groups are mapped to DNN roles on login
Test adding user to new AD group and verify role assignment
Test removing user from AD group and verify role removal
Verify auto-assigned roles are not synchronized
Verify role synchronization doesn't affect non-AD roles

features.name: User Profile Synchronization
features.description: Synchronizes user profile information from Active Directory to DNN user profiles
test_scenarios: Verify first name synchronization from AD
Verify last name synchronization from AD
Verify address fields synchronization (street, city, region, postal code, country)
Test phone number synchronization (telephone, fax, cell)
Verify profile updates don't overwrite with empty values

features.name: Auto User Creation
features.description: Automatically creates DNN user accounts for authenticated Active Directory users
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Auto Create Users
test_scenarios: Login with AD user not in DNN
Test user creation across multiple portals
Verify deleted users can be re-created

features.name: IP-Based Auto Authentication
features.description: Automatically authenticate users based on their IP address ranges
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Auto IP
test_scenarios: Configure single IP address for auto-authentication
Test with multiple IP ranges separated by semicolons

features.name: Domain Name Management
features.description: Configure how domain names are handled in usernames
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Strip Domain Name & Default Domain
test_scenarios: Test login with just username (uses default domain)
Verify username format in DNN after login

features.name: Search Bot Exclusion
features.description: Exclude search engine crawlers from Active Directory authentication
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Search Bots
test_scenarios: Test with MS Search Robot user agent

features.name: Admin Role Mapping
features.description: Map Active Directory groups to DNN administrator role
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Admin Role Mapping
test_scenarios: Configure AD group for admin mapping
Login with user in admin-mapped AD group
Remove user from AD admin group and verify role removal
Verify super user permissions are preserved

features.name: User Identity Mapping
features.description: Maps Active Directory User Principal Names to DNN usernames for flexible authentication
test_scenarios: Test UPN to username mapping on first login
Test login with different UPN formats
Verify mapping updates on user profile changes
Test mapping cleanup on user deletion

features.name: Authentication Cookie Management
features.description: Manages authentication cookies and timeout settings for persistent login

features.name: Network Status Monitoring
features.description: Monitors and reports Active Directory connection status and availability
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings (Status display)
test_scenarios: Verify status updates after configuration changes

features.name: Password Synchronization
features.description: Synchronizes passwords between Active Directory and DNN (one-way randomization for security)
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Synchronize Password
test_scenarios: Verify DNN password is randomized on AD login
Verify AD password is never stored in DNN

features.name: Hide Windows Login Option
features.description: Option to hide the Windows authentication login button from the login page
features.ui_location: Admin > Extensions > Authentication Systems > Active Directory > Settings > Hide Windows Login
test_scenarios: Verify login button is hidden on login page
